ComicInfo.Summary: MODOK Must Triumph!: Working as a sailor, Bruce Banner ends up on a ship controlled by the super-villain MODOK. The ship heads for the Savage Land, where MODOK seeks to capture dinosaurs to mutate and weaponize. MODOK comes into conflict with Ka-Zar, master of the Savage Land, and before long the Hulk also joins the fray...
